item.title: Useful Linux Command Line Commands
item.description: Learning how to use the command line can open up a whole new world. Even knowing a few basic commands can allow you to perform useful tasks. Plus, all your friends will be impressed with your new “hacker” skills! When we open up a terminal session we see something like: jeff@localhost:~$ jeff@localhost:~$ is called a shell prompt and lists your username (jeff) and the name of your Linux machine (mine is named localhost).
